milestones.title: Project Initiation and Planning
milestones.description: Project Kick-off meeting, Finalizing project scope and requirements, Developing project schedule, Identifying necessary resources and materials

milestones.title: Site Preparation
milestones.description: Site survey, Clearing the site, Marking pool boundaries

milestones.title: Excavation
milestones.description: Excavating the pool area, Disposing of excavated materials

milestones.title: Pool Construction
milestones.description: Installing pool framework, Laying pool shell, Installing pool plumbing and electrical systems

milestones.title: Finishing and Cleanup
milestones.description: Finishing pool surface, Installing pool equipment, Cleanup and removal of construction debris
